message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for a steal at $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $115.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $105 for it.
I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I can do $112, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to lower the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $108 for it.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob! I'll meet you at $110, but that's the final offer.
I understand you're trying to close the deal, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $107 for it.
I'm starting to think we're going to be here all day, Bob! I'll give you a small concession, but that's it - $109, take it or leave it.
I appreciate the concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $106 for it.
